General.Name: Eifelhöhen-Klinik AG
General.Description: MedNation AG operates facilities for outpatient and inpatient orthopedics, geriatrics, and internal medicine in Germany. It is also involved in specialist clinic for cardiological rehabilitation. In addition, the company operates specialist clinic with indications for neurology, orthopedics, and medical care center, as well as offers nursing facilities with 39 beds. The company was formerly known as Eifelhöhen-Klinik AG. MedNation AG was founded in 1970 and is based in Bonn, Germany.
